text: Ghulam Mustafa Khan (3 March 1931 â€“ 17 January 2021) was an Indian classical musician. His works were in the Hindustani classical music tradition. He was awarded the Padma Shri in 1991, the Padma Bhushan in 2006 and Padma Vibhushan in 2018. Khan was born in present-day Uttar Pradesh, India. Khan died at his Mumbai home on 17 January 2021, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indian musicians
title: Ghulam Mustafa Khan (singer)
